items.title: It's harder to get home insurance. That's changing communities across the U.S.

• Insurance costs are also rising because people are moving to coastal regions vulnerable to hurricanes and forested areas

items.title: Massive hidden waves are rapidly melting Greenland’s glaciers
bullets: • Researchers in Greenland used fiber-optic cable to track how iceberg calving stirs up warm seawater
• The resulting surface tsunamis and massive hidden underwater waves intensify melting at the glacier face
• This powerful mixing effect accelerates ice loss far more than previously understood
• The work highlights how fragile the Greenland ice system has become as temperatures rise

items.title: The great escape: seal flees killer whales by jumping on to photographer’s boat
bullets: • Charvet Drucker was on a whale-watching trip in the Salish Sea off Seattle when she spotted a pod of at least eight orcas
• The orcas’ coordinated movements and tail slaps suggested they were hunting
• But as the orcas got closer to the boat, Drucker realized the pod was still chasing the seal
• The seal clambered out of the water and on to a swimming platform at the stern of the boat

items.title: Belkin is recalling its iPhone tracking stand and two power banks due to fire risks
bullets: • Belkin has issued a recall for its Auto-Tracking Stand Pro for the iPhone and two versions of its 20,000mAh BoostCharge USB-C PD Power Bank
• A “manufacturing defect may cause the products’ lithium-ion cell components to overheat,” posing a fire and burn risk to users
• The company is offering refunds or a store credit for the full amount with a 20 percent bonus
• About 83,500 of the stands and power banks were sold in the US between August 2020 and August 2025
